TEXT.TITLE: BARRINGER RESOURCES INC <BARR> YEAR END DEC 31
TEXT.BODY:

    NOTE: 1986 net includes 2,168,000 dlrs or 61 cts a share
for gain on cancellation of long-term debt through a debenture
